name: War Rock General Cragg
text:
2 Level 4 Warrior monsters
If this card is Xyz Summoned: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 Earth Warrior. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card: all monsters you control gain 200 ATK, and if 600 ATK or more is gained by this effect; you can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only activate each effect of "War Rock General Cragg" once per turn.
